{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04330v1", "title": "K-stability of Fano 3-folds in the World of Null-A", "summary": "A variety is said to satisfy Condition (A) if every finite abelian subgroup
of its automorphism group has a fixed point. We show that a smooth Fano 3-fold
not satisfying Condition (A) is K-polystable unless it is contained in eight
exceptional deformation families (seven of them consists of one smooth member,
and one of them has one-parameter moduli).", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-05-07T11:26:00Z"}
